title: Copyrights of Fuller Benton & ATF
content:
Have any legal propietary of rights of the fonts designed in the 20's by Morris Fuller Benton for the ATF? (american type founders).   
   
in this time i'm working one of these typefaces, and have these dude...   
   
thanks and scuse-me my english ;-)
author: pepel

comments.content:
ATF/Kingsley has the rights, as far as I know.   
But they might have expired or something - I can never figure that part out.
